description: Describes the specified opted out destination numbers or all opted out destination numbers in an opt-out list. If you specify opted out numbers, the output includes information for only the specified opted out numbers. If you specify filters, the output includes information for only those opted out numbers that meet the filter criteria. If you don't specify opted out numbers or filters, the output includes information for all opted out destination numbers in your opt-out list. If you specify an opted out number that isn't valid, an exception is returned.

parameters.name: OptOutListName
parameters.description: The OptOutListName or OptOutListArn of the OptOutList. You can use  DescribeOptOutLists to find the values for OptOutListName and OptOutListArn.

parameters.name: OptedOutNumbers
parameters.description: An array of phone numbers to search for in the OptOutList. If you specify an opted out number that isn't valid, an exception is returned. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of OptedOutFilter objects to filter the results on. (dict) --- The information for opted out numbers that meet a specified criteria. The name of the attribute to filter on. An array of values to filter for. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to filter on.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: An array of values to filter for.

nested_items.name: OptOutListArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the OptOutList.

nested_items.name: OptedOutNumbers
nested_items.description: An array of OptedOutNumbersInformation objects that provide information about the requested OptedOutNumbers.

nested_items.name: OptedOutNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number that is opted out.

nested_items.name: OptedOutTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that the op tout occurred, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: EndUserOptedOut
nested_items.description: This is set to true if it was the end recipient that opted out.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. If this field is empty then there are no more results.
